quote: Nothing is too high for a man to reach, but he must climb with care and confidence
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Nothing is particularly hard if you divide it into small jobs.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: What loneliness is more lonely than distrust?
author: George Eliot

quote: A simple rule in dealing with those who are hard to get along with is to remember that this person is striving to assert his superiority; and you must deal with him from that point of view.
author: Alfred Adler

quote: A heart is not judged by how much you love, but by how much you are loved by others.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: A fool sees himself as another, but a wise man sees others as himself.
author: Dogen

quote: Happiness must be grown in one's own garden.
author: Mary Engelbreit

quote: The smallest of actions is always better than the noblest of intentions.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Be where your enemy is not.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Any thought that is passed on to the subconscious often enough and convincingly enough is finally accepted.
author: Robert Collier

quote: When asked, how do you write? I invariably answer, one word at a time.
author: Stephen King

quote: A hero is an ordinary person doing things in an extra ordinary way.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The goal is not to show how great you are to others, but how vulnerable you are to yourself.
author: Maxime Lagace

quote: The more reasons you have for achieving your goal, the more determined you will become.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Nothing is easier than fault finding.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Learn from the rejection and turn it into an opportunity!
author: Mary Engelbreit

quote: The only reason to be alive is to enjoy it.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: You find peace not by rearranging the circumstances of your life, but by realizing who you are at the deepest level.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Constantly think about how you could be doing things better.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Hope is a waking dream.
author: Aristotle

quote: Life can be wonderful if you're not afraid of it.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: It's possible in ways both large or small to make a difference in someone's life.
author: Yanni

quote: If light is in your heart, you will find your way home.
author: Rumi

quote: Forget mistakes. Forget failure. Forget everything except what you are going to do now and do it. Today is your lucky day!
author: Og Mandino

quote: Beware of false knowledge, it is more dangerous than ignorance.
author: George Bernard Shaw
